name: Leaped Services
description: LeapEd aims to develop holistic students with 21st century skills and schools that embed sustainable school improvement practices. Working closely with its strategic partners and the Malaysia Ministry of Education, LeapEd focuses on student-centred teaching and learning to realise the individual potential of every learner.
Headline: Learni ng enriched
ShortDescription: LeapEd Services Sdn Bhd (LeapEd), is Malaysia’s first homegrown Education Service Provider and established social enterprise.

Highlights.name: Programmes for Schools and System
Highlights.description: Although we are widely known for our flagship Trust Schools Programme, we spearhead a variety of educational transformation initiatives. We currently offer a variety of school transformation programmes that can be tailored to your needs and context.

Highlights.name: Programmes for Teachers and Leaders
Highlights.description: These programmes are aimed at supporting school communities to become motivated, lifelong learners who reimagine and reinvent their roles in the bigger picture of their students’ lives, their school, and their community.

Highlights.name: Programmes for Students
Highlights.description: The aim of these programmes is to develop skills which enable students to be mindful and agile leaders, entrepreneurs, innovators, and global citizens.

enhanced_description: Leaped Services is Malaysia's first homegrown Education Service Provider and established social enterprise, specializing in educational transformation. The organization aims to develop holistic students with 21st-century skills and foster sustainable school improvement practices by focusing on student-centered teaching and learning. Working closely with strategic partners and the Malaysia Ministry of Education, LeapEd offers tailored programs including comprehensive initiatives for schools and education systems, professional development for teachers and leaders, and skill development programs for students, cultivating attributes such as leadership, entrepreneurship, innovation, and global citizenship. Their services also include bespoke training and a strong emphasis on child protection and safeguarding.
key_use_cases: Professional development and continuous learning for teachers and school leaders
Educational transformation initiatives for school systems
Designing and delivering bespoke training programs
Ensuring child protection and safeguarding in educational environments
Authoring and managing learning content for educational programs
competitive_advantages: Positioned as Malaysia's first homegrown Education Service Provider and social enterprise
Strong collaboration and partnership with the Malaysia Ministry of Education and NGOs
Provision of bespoke training and tailored educational programs
Specialized focus on Child Protection and Safeguarding Approach
implementation_scenarios: Consultative program delivery for educational transformation
Tailored program implementation for schools and systems
roi_benefits: Improved student potential and skill development (e.g., 21st-century skills, leadership, entrepreneurship, global citizenship)
Enhancing the capabilities and lifelong learning of teachers and school leaders
Optimizing overall learning outcomes within educational institutions
